translation.en: OPTIMUS: Before time began, there was the Cube.

translation.en: and the Cube was lost to the far reaches of space.

translation.en: We scattered across the galaxy, hoping to find it and rebuild our home,

translation.en: REPORTER ON TV: It was an awesome spectacle here an hour ago
translation.ja: １時間前に この基地から―

translation.en: when over 40 C-17s lifted off of this very base.
translation.ja: 40機以上のＣ17が飛び立ちました

translation.en: We're not told where they're going.
translation.ja: 行き先は不明で…

translation.en: Morning, Mo.
translation.ja: おはよう

translation.en: The government has been very quiet about what's going on but in our... Mojo. Mojo. They were headed directly
translation.ja: モージョ モージョ

translation.en: Stop with the barking, Mojo. It's too early. Please?
translation.ja: 吠えるなまだ早朝なんだから

translation.en: Miles? Miles, listen to me. Listen.
translation.ja: マイルズ 僕の車が―

translation.en: My car, it stole itself, okay?
translation.ja: 自分で動いた

translation.en: What are you talking about, man?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: Satan's Camaro. In my yard. It's stalking me.
translation.ja: “悪魔のカマロ”が僕を狙ってる

translation.en: Stop!
translation.ja: やめろ！

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no.
translation.ja: やめてくれ

translation.en: (GROANING) Sam?
translation.ja: サム？

translation.en: That was... That was really awesome.
translation.ja: 今の本当に― スゴかった

translation.en: (GROANING) Well, it felt awesome. Are you okay?
translation.ja: 僕も そう思う 大丈夫？

translation.en: I'm not okay, all right? I'm losing my mind a little bit. I'm getting chased by my car right now. I got to go.
translation.ja: 正気を失ったかも車に追われてる

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna catch up with you guys later.
translation.ja: また後でね

translation.en: Oh, great. Cops.
translation.ja: パトカーだ

translation.en: (ENGINE REVVING)
translation.ja: “罪人を罰し服従させ…”

translation.en: Officer!
translation.ja: お巡りさん！

translation.en: Listen!
translation.ja: 聞いて

translation.en: Oh, that hurt.
translation.ja: 痛い！

translation.en: Listen to me!
translation.ja: 話を聞いて下さい

translation.en: Thank God you're here! I've had the worst day ever!
translation.ja: 話を聞いて下さい ここまで母の自転車で逃げて来た

translation.en: I've been... I've been followed here on my mother's bike! Right?
translation.ja: ここまで母の自転車で逃げて来た 僕の車に追われてるんだ

translation.en: And my car's right there and it's been following me here!
translation.ja: 僕の車に追われてるんだ

translation.en: So get out of the car!
translation.ja: 車を降りて

translation.en: (ENGINE ROARING) No! Stop! Oh, God. Okay, okay! Okay, all right!
translation.ja: やめて 僕が悪かった　やめてよ！

translation.en: Okay! I'm sorry! I'm... I didn't mean to hit your car! Look!
translation.ja: 僕が悪かった　やめてよ！ ぶつけるつもりはなかった

translation.en: Okay, look, look, look! Stop, stop!
translation.ja: とにかくやめてくれ！

translation.en: Please! Okay, what do you want from me?
translation.ja: よせ！何がしたいんだ？

translation.en: Oh, God, no! No!
translation.ja: 何だこれ　よせ！

translation.en: Oh, shit! Oh, shit, shit, shit! Oh, God! Oh, shit!
translation.ja: どうなってるんだ　神様！

translation.en: It's a bad dream.
translation.ja: 悪い夢だ

translation.en: Are you username LadiesMan217?
translation.ja: “プレイボーイ217”か？

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about!
translation.ja: 何の話だ？

translation.en: Are you username LadiesMan217?
translation.ja: “プレイボーイ217”か？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Where is eBay item 21153?
translation.ja: “出品番号21153”はどこだ？

translation.en: Where are the glasses?
translation.ja: 眼鏡はどこだ？

translation.en: Get back!
translation.ja: 来るな！ 逃げろ！

translation.en: (GRUNTING)
translation.ja: 逃げろ！

translation.en: What is your problem, Sam?
translation.ja: 何なのよ？

translation.en: Okay, there's a monster right there! It just attacked me!
translation.ja: 怪物に襲われた

translation.en: Here he comes! All right, get up.
translation.ja: 来るぞ！ すぐに逃げないと

translation.en: Get up and run! You have to run! Okay.
translation.ja: すぐに逃げないと

translation.en: Sam, what is that thing?
translation.ja: あれ何？

translation.en: You have to get in the car. Get in. I don't want to. Get in the car. Trust me. Trust me! Sam.
translation.ja: 車に乗るんだ僕を信用しろ

translation.en: Get in! Go, go, go, go, go.
translation.ja: 乗って！ 行け 行け 行け！

translation.en: Go, go, go, go!
translation.ja: 速く走れ！

translation.en: Oh, God! We're gonna die! We're gonna die!
translation.ja: 死ぬわ！ 大丈夫　死んだりしない

translation.en: No, we're not. No, we're not gonna die.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　死んだりしない

translation.en: Oh, my God! Trust me. He's a kick-ass driver!
translation.ja: “彼”の運転は最高だ

translation.en: We're gonna die!
translation.ja: ダメだ　死ぬ！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.ja: 大変！

translation.en: We're locked in.
translation.ja: 開かない

translation.en: (CAR PASSING) The car won't start. At least we ditched the monster, right?
translation.ja: エンストだけど逃げ切った

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 頼むぞ

translation.en: Time to start.
translation.ja: スタートしろ

translation.en: (SPEAKING IN ALIEN LANGUAGE)
translation.ja: 眼鏡はどこだ？

translation.en: He's got me! Oh, God!
translation.ja: 捕まった！

translation.en: He's going to kill me!
translation.ja: 殺される！

translation.en: No. No, no, no!
translation.ja: やめろ！ やめてくれ！

translation.en: Get off!
translation.ja: 離れろ！

translation.en: Kill it! Kill it!
translation.ja: やっちまえ！

translation.en: Not so tough without a head, are you?
translation.ja: 頭がなけりゃ弱い

translation.en: Here, come on.
translation.ja: 来なよ

translation.en: MIKAELA: What is it?
translation.ja: あれ何？

translation.en: It's a robot.
translation.ja: ロボットだ

translation.en: But like a...
translation.ja: だけど―

translation.en: Like a different... You know, like a super-advanced robot.
translation.ja: 超最先端のロボットだよ

translation.en: It's probably Japanese.
translation.ja: たぶん日本製だ

translation.en: Yeah, it's definitely Japanese.
translation.ja: 日本製に決まってる

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何してるの？

translation.en: I don't think it wants to hurt us.
translation.ja: 危害は加えてこない

translation.en: Really? Well, do you speak robot? Because they just had, like, a giant droid death match.
translation.ja: ロボット語 話せるの？今もスゴい死闘だったのよ

translation.en: I think it wants something from me.
translation.ja: 何かを探してる

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何を？

translation.en: Well, 'cause the other one was talking about my eBay page.
translation.ja: 僕が競売に出した物を

translation.en: You are the strangest boy I have ever met.
translation.ja: あなた 本当に変な人ね

translation.en: SAM: Can you talk? ANNOUNCER: XM Satellite Radio...
translation.ja: 話せるか？ “こちらＸＭ衛星放送…ＣＢＳラジオ局…”

translation.en: (RADIO CHANNELS SWITCHING) Digital cable brings you... ...Columbia Broadcasting System...
translation.ja: “こちらＸＭ衛星放送…ＣＢＳラジオ局…”

translation.en: So you... You talk through the radio?
translation.ja: ラジオで話すのか？ “ありがとう　君は最高”

translation.en: Thank you, you're beautiful. You're wonderful, you're wonderful.
translation.ja: “ありがとう　君は最高”

translation.en: So, what was that last night? What was that?
translation.ja: 昨夜は何だったんだ？

translation.en: Message from Starfleet, Captain...
translation.ja: “こちら宇宙艦隊宇宙の彼方から…”

translation.en: Throughout the inanimate vastness of space...
translation.ja: “こちら宇宙艦隊宇宙の彼方から…” “天使たちが訪れるハレルヤ！”

translation.en: Angels will rain down like visitors from heaven! Hallelujah!
translation.ja: “天使たちが訪れるハレルヤ！”

translation.en: Visitors from heaven? What...
translation.ja: 宇宙の彼方から？

translation.en: What are you, like, an alien or something?
translation.ja: あなた エイリアン？

translation.en: Any more questions you want to ask?
translation.ja: “他に聞きたいことは？”

translation.en: He wants us to get in the car.
translation.ja: “車に乗れ”とさ

translation.en: And go where?
translation.ja: 行き先は？

translation.en: Fifty years from now, when you're looking back at your life, don't you want to be able to say you had the guts to get in the car?
translation.ja: 50年後になって後悔したくないだろ？

translation.en: This car's a pretty good driver.
translation.ja: 運転が上手ね

translation.en: Why don't you go sit in that seat, there?
translation.ja: 運転席に座れば？

translation.en: I'm not going to sit in that seat. He's driving.
translation.ja: “彼”が運転してるから

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: たしかに

translation.en: Well, maybe you should sit in my lap.
translation.ja: 僕のヒザの上に

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: 何で？

translation.en: Well, I have the only seat belt here. You know, safety first.
translation.ja: シートベルトを僕と一緒に

translation.en: Yeah, all right. Right?
translation.ja: そうね いい？

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
translation.ja: じゃ こっちに

translation.en: There, see? That's better.
translation.ja: これでいい

translation.en: You know, that seat belt thing was a pretty smooth move.
translation.ja: うまい口実を考えたわね

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: You know what I don't understand?
translation.ja: でも分からない

translation.en: Why, if he's supposed to be, like, this super-advanced robot, does he transform back into this piece-of-crap Camaro?
translation.ja: 超最新鋭のロボットがなぜ元のボロ車に戻るの？

translation.en: SAM: Whoa! Whoa! Oh, see? No. Get... No, that doesn't work. See?
translation.ja: ダメだよ今みたいなことを言ったら

translation.en: Great, now... See?
translation.ja: まったく 見ろ

translation.en: Fantastic. Now you pissed him off.
translation.ja: 君が彼を怒らせたんだぞ

translation.en: That car is sensitive.
translation.ja: 傷つきやすい

translation.en: I mean, $4000 just drove off.
translation.ja: 4000ドルの車が消えた

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.ja: 大変だ　見ろよ！

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
translation.ja: 早く

translation.en: This is the coolest thing I've ever seen! Explosions everywhere!
translation.ja: こんなカッコいいもの初めてだ！ “アルマゲドン”の100倍スゴい！

translation.en: This is easily a hundred times cooler than Armageddon. I swear to God!
translation.ja: “アルマゲドン”の100倍スゴい！

translation.en: Fire, fire, fire, fire!
translation.ja: そこら中で爆発だ

translation.en: Whoa! Sweet!
translation.ja: うわあ！ 最高だ！

translation.en: Oh, dude, I hope this guy's got asteroid insurance, 'cause he is so boned!
translation.ja: 隕石災害保険に入ってるかな？ボロボロだ

translation.en: What is that?
translation.ja: それは？

translation.en: There's something in the tree, dude. No, there's something in the thing by the tree!
translation.ja: そこの木のそばに変なものがいるぞ

translation.en: Could you guys just give me a space rock?
translation.ja: “宇宙の石”をくれ

translation.en: Excuse me, are you the tooth fairy?
translation.ja: あなたが歯の妖精さん？

translation.en: Hey, sweetheart, what are you doing out here by yourself?
translation.ja: 独りで何やってるんだ？

translation.en: Holy God! What happened to the pool?
translation.ja: プールに何が起きた？

translation.en: Are you Samuel James Witwicky, descendent of Archibald Witwicky?
translation.ja: ウィトウィッキーの子孫サムはお前か？

translation.en: They know your name.
translation.ja: 名前を知ってる

translation.en: My name is Optimus Prime.
translation.ja: 私はオプティマス･プライム

translation.en: We are autonomous robotic organisms from the planet Cybertron.
translation.ja: 惑星サイバトロンから来た金属生命体だ

translation.en: But you can call us Autobots for short.
translation.ja: “オートボット”と呼んでくれ

translation.en: Autobots.
translation.ja: オートボット

translation.en: What's cracking, little bitches?
translation.ja: よお ネエちゃん

translation.en: OPTIMUS: My first lieutenant. Designation, Jazz.
translation.ja: 彼は我が軍の将軍名前はジャズ

translation.en: JAZZ: This looks like a cool place to kick it.
translation.ja: いい星じゃんかよ

translation.en: What is that? How did he learn to talk like that?
translation.ja: その話し方は？

translation.en: We've learned Earth's languages through the World Wide Web.
translation.ja: 地球の言葉をインターネットで学んだ

translation.en: My weapons specialist, Ironhide.
translation.ja: 武器担当のアイアンハイドだ

translation.en: You feeling lucky, punk?
translation.ja: 幸運を試すか？

translation.en: Easy, Ironhide.
translation.ja: よせ アイアンハイド

translation.en: Just kidding. I just wanted to show him my cannons.
translation.ja: 冗談だ砲を見せたかっただけだよ

translation.en: (SNIFFING) OPTIMUS: Our medical officer, Ratchet.
translation.ja: 軍医のラチェット この少年は女性との交配を望んでいる

translation.en: The boy's pheromone level suggests he wants to mate with the female.
translation.ja: この少年は女性との交配を望んでいる

translation.en: You already know your guardian, Bumblebee.
translation.ja: 君のボディガードバンブルビーだ

translation.en: (RAP MUSIC PLAYING) Bumblebee, right?
translation.ja: 彼はバンブルビー？

translation.en: So you're my guardian, huh?
translation.ja: 僕のボディガード？

translation.en: His vocal processors were damaged in battle. I'm still working on them.
translation.ja: 戦いで発声機能が損傷した まだ修理できてない

translation.en: Why are you here?
translation.ja: なぜ地球に？

translation.en: We are here looking for the All Spark. And we must find it before Megatron.
translation.ja: “オールスパーク”を見つけるメガトロンより先に

translation.en: Mega-what?
translation.ja: メガ… 何？

translation.en: OPTIMUS: Our planet was once a powerful empire, peaceful and just,
translation.ja: 我々の星はかつて繁栄し― 平和で秩序正しかった

translation.en: until we were betrayed by Megatron, leader of the Decepticons.
translation.ja: だがディセプティコンのリーダーメガトロンが反乱を起こし―

translation.en: All who defied them were destroyed.
translation.ja: 逆らう者はすべて破壊された

translation.en: Our war finally consumed the planet,
translation.ja: 戦火は星全体に広がり

translation.en: and the All Spark was lost to the stars.
translation.ja: “オールスパーク”は失われた

translation.en: Megatron followed it to Earth, where Captain Witwicky found him.
translation.ja: メガトロンは地球に渡り― ウィトウィッキーに発見された

translation.en: My grandfather.
translation.ja: 僕の先祖だ

translation.en: It was an accident that intertwined our fates.
translation.ja: 偶然により彼と我々の運命が交錯した

translation.en: Come back!
translation.ja: 戻れ！

translation.en: I think the dogs have found something.
translation.ja: 犬が何かを見つけた

translation.en: The ice is cracking!
translation.ja: 氷が割れる

translation.en: (ALL SHOUTING)
translation.ja: 早く逃げろ！

translation.en: Captain! Grab my rope, Captain!
translation.ja: 隊長 ロープをつかんで！

translation.en: I'm all right, lads!
translation.ja: 私は無事だ

translation.en: Can we throw you a rope, Captain?
translation.ja: ロープを投げますよ

translation.en: Megatron crash-landed before he could retrieve the Cube.
translation.ja: メガトロンは地球に墜落した“キューブ”を見つける前に

translation.en: Men! We've made a discovery!
translation.ja: みんなこれは大変な発見だぞ！

translation.en: He accidentally activated his navigation system.
translation.ja: 彼は偶然誘導システムを起動した

translation.en: OPTIMUS: The coordinates to the Cube's location on Earth were imprinted on his glasses.
translation.ja: “キューブ”の位置座標が彼の眼鏡に刻印された

translation.en: How'd you know about his glasses?
translation.ja: どこで知った？

translation.en: eBay. eBay.
translation.ja: ｅＢａｙ(イーベイ)だ

translation.en: If the Decepticons find the All Spark,
translation.ja: “オールスパーク”が敵に渡れば―

translation.en: they will use its power to transform Earth's machines and build a new army.
translation.ja: 地球上の機械を＜変身(トランスフォーム)＞させ― 奴らは新たな軍団を作る

translation.en: And the human race will be extinguished.
translation.ja: 人類は抹殺される

translation.en: Sam Witwicky, you hold the key to Earth's survival.
translation.ja: いいか サムよ 君が人類生存のカギなのだ

translation.en: Please tell me that you have those glasses.
translation.ja: その眼鏡 持ってるよね？

translation.en: It's like a self-regenerating molecular armor.
translation.ja: 自己再生可能な金属細胞だ

translation.en: Look at the scorch mark where the sabot round hit.
translation.ja: ＡＰＤＳ弾が当たって溶けた跡だ

translation.en: Melted right through.
translation.ja: ＡＰＤＳ弾が当たって溶けた跡だ ＡＰＤＳ弾は3000度の高熱になるな？

translation.en: Hey, aren't sabots hot-loaded for, like, a 6,000-degree magnesium burn?
translation.ja: ＡＰＤＳ弾は3000度の高熱になるな？

translation.en: Close to it. It melts tank armor.
translation.ja: 戦車のボディも溶ける

translation.en: So this metal skin must react to extreme heat.
translation.ja: 金属の皮膚が熱に溶けた

translation.en: Heads up! Oh!
translation.ja: 危ない！

translation.en: I thought you said that thing was dead, man!
translation.ja: これは死んだはずだろ？

translation.en: Strap it down! Strap it! This thing is wicked.
translation.ja: 縛りつけるんだ！ どうなってる？

translation.en: All right, get on the horn with Northern Command. Tell them that our effective weapon is high-heat sabot rounds. Recommend we load them on all the gunships. Go.
translation.ja: 司令部に連絡しろ“高熱のＡＰＤＳ弾が有効だ”と

translation.en: You want that piece?
translation.ja: 食べるか？

translation.en: Okay, Maggie, look.
translation.ja: なあ マギー

translation.en: Let me break it down to you how it's gonna happen. They gonna come through that door and be good cop, bad cop.
translation.ja: 今から奴らは“いい警官 悪い警官”をやる

translation.en: Don't fall for that, all right? That's why I ate their food.
translation.ja: 引っかからないよう食ってるんだ

translation.en: See, they put the plate of donuts out here to test your guilt. If you don't touch it, you're guilty.
translation.ja: “罪人だから食欲がない”と思われないように

translation.en: I ate the whole plate. The whole plate. Okay?
translation.ja: オレはひと皿全部 食ったぞ

translation.en: It's me and you.
translation.ja: ここだけの話だ

translation.en: They walk through that door, you don't say nothing.
translation.ja: 奴らには何も話すな

translation.en: She did it! She did it! She's the one you want! All right?
translation.ja: この女だ！ 悪いのは こいつだ！ オレはゲームしてたのにこの女が押しかけた

translation.en: I was just sitting at home watching cartoons, playing video games with my cousin, and she came in there.
translation.ja: オレはゲームしてたのにこの女が押しかけた

translation.en: And then... Glen, you freak.
translation.ja: 最低ね オレは刑務所はイヤだ

translation.en: Hey! I am not going to jail for you or anybody else!
translation.ja: オレは刑務所はイヤだ

translation.en: I have done nothing bad my entire life!
translation.ja: 悪いことはしてない

translation.en: Hey, man, I'm still a virgin.
translation.ja: それに まだ童貞だ

translation.en: Okay, so what? I've downloaded a couple of thousand songs off the Internet. Who hasn't? Who hasn't?
translation.ja: ネットで数千曲もダウンロードしたのは認める

translation.en: I promise! Glen, shut up!
translation.ja: 黙ってよ オレに話しかけるな

translation.en: No, you shut up! Don't talk to me! Don't talk to me, criminal!
translation.ja: オレに話しかけるな この犯罪者め！

translation.en: Oh, sugar rush. This is... This is not his fault.
translation.ja: 糖分でハイに… 彼は無実よ

translation.en: See? So can I go home now?
translation.ja: 帰っていいか？

translation.en: Oh, okay. I won't. But just listen to me.
translation.ja: 話を聞いて

translation.en: Okay, whoever hacked into your military system downloaded a file, all right? It was something about someone named Witwicky
translation.ja: 奪われた軍のファイルはウィトウィッキーという人と―

translation.en: and some government group, right? Named Sector Seven.
translation.ja: セクター７という部署に関してのものよ

translation.en: You have to let me talk to Defense Secretary Keller before you go to war with the wrong country!
translation.ja: 戦争を始める前に国防長官と話をさせて

translation.en: Whatever fell out of the sky ended up right behind...
translation.ja: 空から落ちてきた物は…

translation.en: What did he say? What?
translation.ja: 何だって？ 彼も？

translation.en: Did he hear it, too? Yeah, Jack heard it, too. Yeah.
translation.ja: “聞いた”と 何なの？

translation.en: What does he think it is? He thinks it's a military experiment.
translation.ja: 軍の実験らしい

translation.en: What a knucklehead. Yeah, well, I think it's a plane.
translation.ja: 飛行機かも

translation.en: Still no official word as to what happened. You can see...
translation.ja: 当局の発表はありませんが…

translation.en: Yeah! Call Sam. Yeah. Why? He should be home in 15 minutes.
translation.ja: サムの門限は15分後よ

translation.en: Well, I'll call him in 15 minutes.
translation.ja: 後で電話する 遅れたら外出禁止よ

translation.en: If you wait 15 minutes, he'll be late and you'll have to ground him.
translation.ja: 遅れたら外出禁止よ

translation.en: Well, I can't ground him if he's not late, can I?

translation.en: the microchip, lasers, spaceflight, cars,

translation.en: all reverse-engineered by studying him.

translation.en: Well, you got one now.

translation.en: So why Earth? SAM: It's the All Spark.

translation.en: Well, yeah, they came here looking for some sort of cube-looking thing.

translation.en: Anyway, Mr. NBE One here, AKA Megatron,

translation.en: that's what they call him, who's pretty much the harbinger of death, wants to use the Cube

translation.en: to transform human technology to take over the universe. That's their plan.

translation.en: And you're sure about that?

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: Wrap it around the head.

translation.en: Sam!

translation.en: Right there. Okay.

translation.en: SAM: And take that and wrap it around the base and then put it around his neck.

translation.en: Epps, get those Black Hawks here!

translation.en: That building.

translation.en: Okay. What?

translation.en: All right, I can't leave my guys back there, so here, take this flare.

translation.en: Okay, there's a tall, white building with statues on top.

translation.en: Listen to me! You're a soldier now!

translation.en: All right? I need you to take this Cube. Get it into military hands while we hold them off, or a lot of people are gonna die.

translation.en: You got to go. You got to go. No, I'm not leaving.

translation.en: Army Black Hawk requested. Immediate evac for civilian boy with precious cargo.

translation.en: Headed to rooftop marked by flare.

translation.en: Sam, we will protect you.

translation.en: LENNOX: Epps, where are those planes?

translation.en: Sam!

translation.en: No matter what happens, I'm really glad I got in that car with you.

translation.en: Sam! Get to the building! Move!

translation.en: Hit it!

translation.en: Watch out!

translation.en: Megatron!

translation.en: Prime.

translation.en: Humans don't deserve to live.

translation.en: Then you will die with them!

translation.en: Join them in extinction!

translation.en: Keep moving, Sam!

translation.en: Don't stop!

translation.en: Oh, no!

translation.en: Hey! I'm over here!

translation.en: Missile!

translation.en: Hang on, Sam!

translation.en: No! No!

translation.en: Is it fear or courage that compels you, fleshling?

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no.

translation.en: Oh, so unwise.

translation.en: I got you, boy.

translation.en: Hold on to the Cube!

translation.en: Disgusting.

translation.en: Sam?

translation.en: No sacrifice,

translation.en: no victory. If I cannot defeat Megatron,

translation.en: It's you and me, Megatron.

translation.ja: 戦いの果てに―

translation.en: one shall stand, one shall fall.
translation.ja: どちらかが勝ちどちらかが倒れる

translation.en: You still fight for the weak! That is why you lose!

translation.en: Fighter jets in 60 seconds.

translation.en: Bring the rain. All right?

translation.en: All right, let's kill these things.

translation.en: Move, move, move! Remember, aim low.

translation.en: Incoming!

translation.en: PILOT: Weapons armed. Status green.

translation.en: Run! Move!

translation.en: Second wave's on approach.

translation.en: What is that? Break off!

translation.en: Copy. It's either a massive amount of...

translation.en: Stay on him. Keep him in your sights.

translation.en: Take him out!
translation.ja: 倒せ！

translation.en: I'll kill you!

translation.en: Mine! All Spark!

translation.en: Sam! Put the Cube in my chest! Now!

translation.en: Sam!
translation.ja: サム

translation.en: No, Sam!

translation.en: Hold up.
translation.ja: 止まれ

translation.en: OPTIMUS: You left me no choice, brother.

translation.en: Sam, I owe you my life.
translation.ja: サム 君は私の命を救ってくれた

translation.en: We are in your debt.
translation.ja: 我々は借りができた

translation.en: Prime, we couldn't save him.

translation.en: Aw, Jazz.
translation.ja: ジャズ…

translation.en: We lost a great comrade but gained new ones.

translation.en: Thank you, all of you. You honor us with your bravery.

translation.en: Permission to speak, sir?
translation.ja: 発言許可を

translation.en: Permission granted, old friend.
translation.ja: 許可を与える　古き友よ

translation.en: You speak now?

translation.en: I wish to stay with the boy.

translation.en: If that is his choice.
translation.ja: 彼が そう望むなら

translation.en: Yes.

translation.en: Gentlemen, the President has ordered Sector Seven be terminated
translation.ja: 大統領命令でセクター７は解散となった

translation.en: and the remains of the dead aliens disposed of.
translation.ja: エイリアンを廃棄するのは―

translation.en: The Laurentian Abyss is seven miles below sea level, deepest place on our planet.
translation.ja: 世界最深 水面下11キロのローレンシア海溝

translation.en: The massive depth and pressure there, coupled with subfreezing temperatures, would crush and entomb them,
translation.ja: 非常に深く 水圧が高く凍りつくような その場所なら―

translation.en: leaving no evidence.
translation.ja: 証拠は残らない

translation.en: OPTIMUS: With the All Spark gone, we cannot return life to our planet.
translation.ja: “オールスパーク”が消え故郷には帰れなくなった

translation.en: And fate has yielded its reward,
translation.ja: 運命が我々に与えた報酬は―

translation.en: a new world to call home.
translation.ja: 新しい故郷となる世界だ

translation.en: We live among its people now, hiding in plain sight,

translation.en: but watching over them in secret,
translation.ja: 彼らを見守っている

translation.en: waiting, protecting.
translation.ja: 待ちながら彼らを守ってる

translation.en: I have witnessed their capacity for courage.
translation.ja: 私は彼らの勇気ある行動力を見た

translation.en: And though we are worlds apart,
translation.ja: 見かけは違っても人間は我々と同様に―

translation.en: like us, there's more to them than meets the eye.
translation.ja: 見かけは違っても人間は我々と同様に― 目に見える以上の力を持っている

translation.en: I am Optimus Prime
translation.ja: 私はオプティマス･プライム

translation.en: and I send this message to any surviving Autobots
translation.ja: 生き残ったオートボットたち―

translation.en: taking refuge among the stars.
translation.ja: 星の彼方に散った仲間たち

translation.en: We are here. We are waiting.
translation.ja: 我々はここでいつまでも待っている

translation.en: Can you shed any light on the recent, so-called alien activity in the area?
translation.ja: 最近 エイリアンが活動してるとか何かご意見は？

translation.en: Do you know what? I think that
translation.ja: そうね 私が思うに―

translation.en: if there was some sort of an alien
translation.ja: もしエイリアンが地球に―

translation.en: infestation... Yeah.
translation.ja: はびこってたら… その時は きっと政府が…

translation.en: They, the government, would be the first to let you know.
translation.ja: その時は きっと政府が…

translation.en: The government would let us know.
translation.ja: 政府が教えてくれるわ

translation.en: I mean, this is America. Yeah.
translation.ja: ここはアメリカ

translation.en: You know, that's how we know we live in a free land, because there's no secrets.
translation.ja: 自由の国だから秘密なんてないはずよ

translation.en: They'd say, "Hey! Duck and cover."
translation.ja: “隠れろ！”と言ってくれる

translation.en: Your head is kind of a different size than it is on television.
translation.ja: テレビで見るよりあなた 頭が大きいのね
